page.shortlink: api a5ws create security files function
page.description: Create Default Web Security Files for Web Project. Used in V8 Web Application Server and later

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. = Indicates that security files were created. .F. = Indicates that security files were not created.

page.discussion: The A5WS_CreateSecurityFiles() function creates default security files for a web publishing project. A5WS_CreateSecurityFiles() has limited use for an end user, because, if no security files have been created, Alpha Anywhere automatically creates security files as part of the publishing process. If run in Version 8, A5WS_CreateSecurityFiles() will not overwrite any existing security files, just create default files if none exist. If run in Version 7, the function will always overwrite any existing security files and create default files with security turned off.

see.ref: Creates default security files for a web publishing project
